graph_title: Number of companies that have a Common Good Balance Certificate
indicator_name: Number of companies in Treptow-Köpenick that have a valid "Common Good Balance" certificate
source_organisation_1: International Federation for the Economy for the Common Good e.V.
target_name: Measure - Integration of the Economy for the Common Good (ECG) and social entrepreneurship into the district's start-up advisory services
page_content: The indicator shows how many companies in Treptow-Köpenick have a valid certificate of a common good balance sheet in each year.

de.graph_title: Anzahl der Unternehmen die über ein  Gemeinwohl-Bilanz Testat verfügen
de.page_content: Der Indikator zeigt wie viele Unternehmen in Treptow-Köpenick in jedem Jahr über ein gültiges Testat einer Gemeinwohl-Bilanz verfügen.
